sections.title: Restricted Payments
sections.content:
Section 4.1 Restricted Payments
The Borrower shall not, and shall not permit any of its Subsidiaries to, directly or indirectly:
(a) declare or pay any dividend or make any other payment or distribution on account of the Borrower's
or any of its Subsidiaries' Equity Interests (including, without limitation, any payment in connection with
any merger or consolidation involving the Borrower or any of its Subsidiaries) or to the direct or indirect
holders of the Borrower's or any of its Subsidiaries...
